summary: This mod adds Elandil, a Maormer Spellsword to the Windpeak Inn in Dawnstar.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Elandil, Maormer Follower[/size][/color][/font]


[font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]This mod adds Elandil, a unique Maormer follower to Skyrim. You can find him waiting for you within the Windpeak Inn, at Dawnstar.[/size][/color][/font][font=Times New Roman]
[/font]
[size=4][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]He is more or less standalone despite the need for 'RDO' (Relationship Dialogue Overhaul) because of his unique voice type (MaleElfHaughty).

[/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]Please refer to the 'instructions' readme and the required mods section to find out what you will need for this mod to work. [/color][/font][/size]
[font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Features:[/size][/color][/font][list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Lightfoot (will not set off traps)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Essential (cannot be killed)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Marriageable (testing)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Hearthfires steward & housecarl (testing)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Unique weapons & armor with enchantments[/size][/color][/font]
[/list]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Credits [/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Big thanks goes to [/size][/color][/font]
[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79622/]Oaristys[/url]﻿ for The Witcher 3 Eyes[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]Kalilies[/url]﻿ & Stealthic for the KS Hairdo's Renewal[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69474/]Reaperix[/url]﻿ for Elemental Destruction Magic[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]• CD Projekt for The Witcher 3.[/size][/color][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]The Witcher 3 meshes and textures are owned and copyrighted by CD Projekt and used with explicit permission.
The Witcher is a trademark of CD Projekt. All rights reserved. http://www.cdprojekt.com
[/size][/color][/font][/list][font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Optional but Recommended Mod(s):[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24273/]Ethereal Elven Overhaul[/url]﻿ by Nuska[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1255/]Glass Armor and Weapon Recolour Mod Blue[/url]﻿ by Diranar (shown in screenshots, not included in mod)[/size][/font]
[/list]
author: AedanStarfang
